ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:55:13 [Issue ID 4000-25201] urn:comicvine:4000-25201 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 02:09:44. [Issue ID 39636]
ComicInfo.Title: Lost in the Multiverse; A Babe in Arms
ComicInfo.Summary:
Lost in the Multiverse: Following the destruction of the mulitverse by the Dark Destroyer, Scanner One flies through a new universe. Unknown to the crew though, Kargg is onboard, with vengeance on his mind.
A Babe in Arms: When Babe is accidentally knocked out of his nest, he saves an astro pilot from some tiny cannibals. To return the favor, the pilot delivers Babe back to his nest.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
